explains: vi. 重新露面；浮上水面
vt. 重铺路面；为……铺设新表面

sentences.en: Meanwhile the race is on to resurface the road before next Wednesday.
sentences.cn: 与此同时正赶着在下周三前把路面重新铺好。

sentences.en: It is likely that they would go into hiding for a few weeks, and resurface when the publicity died down.
sentences.cn: 他们可能会躲藏几个星期，等公众关注减弱以后再重新露面。

sentences.en: His bad habits began to resurface.
sentences.cn: 他的坏习惯又冒了出来。
